description: A range of microscopic techniques including brightfield, darkfield, interference, fluorescence, and advanced techniques including laser confocal microscopy are covered in this course. In parallel to microscope training sessions, students learn the latest computer techniques for video image grabbing and analysis. Teams design investigative projects that make use of appropriate mircoscope and computer technologies. Offered during Interim. Prerequisite: BIO 227 or CH/BI 227.
name: Probing Life W/Light
title: Probing Life With Light
